    UsersModelRegistration::getData

    getData( );

    Returns

    Data object on success, false on failure.

    Remarks

    Method to get the registration form data.

    The base form data is loaded and then an event is fired for users plugins to extend the data.

    since

    1.6

    access

    public

    [ Top ]


    UsersModelRegistration::getForm

    getForm( [array $data = array()], [boolean $loadData = true] );

    Parameters

    $data

    An optional array of data for the form to interogate.

    $loadData

    True if the form is to load its own data (default case), false if not.

    Returns

    A JForm object on success, false on failure

    Remarks

    Method to get the registration form.

    The base form is loaded from XML and then an event is fired for users plugins to extend the form with extra fields.

    since

    1.6

    access

    public
